changeSet.author: hparry
changeSet.createView: SELECT bl.id, res.name AS agency, b.name AS product, rel.name AS relationship, l.name AS child, bl.notes, up.name AS updated_by, bl.version FROM product_relationship bl JOIN agency res ON bl.agency = res.id JOIN product b ON bl.product = b.id JOIN relationship rel ON bl.relationship = rel.id JOIN relationship l ON bl.child = l.id JOIN agency up ON bl.updated_by = up.id
